casebody.data:
2001-2493 (La. 10/14/02)

In re NEW ORLEANS CAR LEAKAGE FIRE LITIGATION. No. 2001-C-2493. Supreme Court of Louisiana. Oct. 14, 2002.

In re Nova Chemical Inc.;-Defendant; Applying for Writ of Certiorari and/or Review, Parish of Orleans, Civil District Court Div. B, No. 87-16374; to the Court of Appeal, Fourth Circuit, No. 2000-CA-0479.

Denied.

VICTORY, J., would rant the writ. TRAYLOR, J., would grant the writ. WEIMER, J., would grant the writ.
